name: Benjamin Perry
heading: Shopify Dynamic Pricing by Country Code
review: Fantastic experience with Zaid! He's been very professional and talented, solution-oriented Always willing to adjust the scope to fit the project's end goal. Thanks Zaid. Will definitely work with you again!

name: Raymond Hanemaaijer
heading: Customize Shopify Store
review: I gave him a very specific job and he completed it fast and very good. He was really communicating what I liked and his work is excellent

name: Nick Winters
heading: Accordeon Footer Menu for Shopify mobile website
review: Good and solid work. Created an accordeon footer menu for mobile very quickly. Thanks a lot.

name: Faith Dawson
heading: React code bug fixing
review: While striving to write more complex React code, I contacted Zaid to be a senior collaborator. He was easy to work with during his reviews and feedback sessions. I felt supported by Zaid to improve my React skills as a junior developer. He is patient, thoughtful, pleasant, and willing to communicate in the best way to get the project done. I highly recommend his skills and competencies as a remote React developer.

name: Thara Messeroux
heading: Code assistance in MERN Stack
review: I highly recommend Zaid!! He is such a talented software engineer with amazing web dev skills!! He is also patient with a great sense of humor! He has helped me a lot in my web dev class and I am learning so much from him. I am hoping to keep taking lessons with him until the end of my semester. I couldn't recommend him enough!!

name: Alexandrea
heading: HTML and CSS responsiveness
review: Zaid helped me tremendously with my HTML and CSS projects! He gave clear and helpful instructions and explained things in a way that was easy to understand. I highly recommend Zaid for any help you may need with CSS or HTML. He's the best!

name: Karen Lorence
heading: Wordpress Developer
review: He was super helpful and meet all my needs, and explained everything her did. His personality made the sessions even better. I will be using him from now on out for all my needs
